text: Klaus Töpfer (29 July 1938 - 8 June 2024) was a German politician. He was born in Waldenburg, Silesia. He was a member of the CDU. From 1998 to 2006, he was executive director of the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP). Töpfer died on 8 June 2024 from problems caused by a fall in Munich, Germany at the age of 85.Der frühere rheinland-pfälzische Umweltminister Klaus Töpfer ist gestorben ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate Category:Environment ministers of Germany Category:Housing and Urban Development ministers of Germany Category:Accidental deaths from falls
title: Klaus Töpfer
